collector:SoulHarvest.NAME: Soul Harvest
collector:SoulHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! collector:Soul_Snare and collector:Back deals !D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL Exhaust.

collector:Contemplate.NAME: Contemplate
collector:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your collector:Collect pile. Put it in your hand.
collector:Contemplate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your collector:Collect pile. Put it in your hand and Upgrade it.

collector:Forgery.NAME: Forgery
collector:Forgery.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! of 3 cards from your collector:Collect pile. NL Put a Rare copy of them in your hand

collector:Miser.NAME: Miser
collector:Miser.DESCRIPTION: Retain cards that cost less then !M!.

collector:Bargain.NAME: Bargain
collector:Bargain.DESCRIPTION: Switch the Cost of 2 cards in your hand.
collector:Bargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Switch the Cost of 2 cards in your hand.

collector:Consign.NAME: Consign
collector:Consign.DESCRIPTION: *Collector deals !D! damage. NL Apply collector:Suffering equal to unblocked damage dealt.

collector:CullingBlow.NAME: Culling Blow
collector:CullingBlow.DESCRIPTION: collector:Back deals !D! damage. NL if the target has collector:Suffering, Apply !M! collector:Soul_Snare.

collector:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
collector:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: *Collector Deals !D! damage. NL collector:Pyre - bronze:Insert a copy of this with + !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

collector:DancingLight.NAME: Dancing Light
collector:DancingLight.DESCRIPTION: Reduce collector:Torch_Head collector:Aggro to 0 until next turn. NL Draw !M! Card.

collector:FlameLash.NAME: Flame Lash
collector:FlameLash.DESCRIPTION: collector:Back Deals !D! damage. NL collector:Pyre - Add a copy of this to your discard pile with - !M! Cost. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: collector:Back Deals !collector:DUOD! damage. NL collector:Pyre - Add a copy of this to your discard pile with - !M! Cost. NL Exhaust.

collector:Bonfire.NAME: Bonfire
collector:Bonfire.DESCRIPTION: *Torch *Head Deals !collector:DUOD! damage to ALL enemies. NL collector:Pyre - collector:Torch_Head gains !collector:DUOB! Block and !M! collector:Aggro.

collector:FelsteelAegis.NAME: Felsteel Aegis
collector:FelsteelAegis.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Your collector:Torch_Head gains !M! collector:Aggro NL collector:Pyre - add a copy of this to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

collector:Combustibles.NAME: Combustibles
collector:Combustibles.DESCRIPTION: collector:Front Gains !B! Block NL collector:Pyre - Gain 8, 12, or 20 Block based on rarity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: collector:Front Gains !collector:DUOB! Block NL collector:Pyre - Gain 8, 12, or 20 Block based on rarity.

collector:SoulForge.NAME: Soul Forge
collector:SoulForge.DESCRIPTION: collector:Back Gains !M! Vigor. NL collector:Pyre - Gain 4, 8, or 10 Vigor based on rarity.

collector:Mindflare.NAME: Mindflare
collector:Mindflare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card from your collector:Collect pile for each collector:Affliction the target has.

collector:ScorchingRay.NAME: Scorching Ray
collector:ScorchingRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each collector:Affliction the target has.

collector:Wrack.NAME: Wrack
collector:Wrack.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemies collector:Afflictions. NL Exhaust.

collector:FingerofDeath.NAME: Finger of Death
collector:FingerofDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 collector:Suffering Twice. NL When Exhausted : bronze:Insert a copy of this that applies *Suffering an additional time.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 collector:Suffering !M! Times. NL When Exhausted : bronze:Insert a copy of this that applies *Suffering an additional time.

collector:Hellfire.NAME: Hellfire
collector:Hellfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply a random collector:Affliction to a random enemy X Times.
collector:Hellfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply a random *Ï€Upgraded collector:Affliction to a random enemy X Times.

collector:Omen.NAME: Omen
collector:Omen.DESCRIPTION: Dealing Attack Damage to an enemy with at least 6 collector:Afflictions they lose !M! HP.

collector:SelfDestruct.NAME: Self Destruct
collector:SelfDestruct.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, all enemies lose HP equal to your *Torch *Heads HP, Kill your collector:Torch_Head.
collector:SelfDestruct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL At the end of your turn, all enemies lose HP equal to your *Torch *Heads HP, Kill your collector:Torch_Head.

collector:StakingAClaim.NAME: Staking a Claim
collector:StakingAClaim.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! collector:Soul_Snare. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

collector:PainSiphon.NAME: Pain Siphon
collector:PainSiphon.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and Draw a card for each of an enemy's collector:Afflictions NL Exhaust.

collector:HighStakes.NAME: High Stakes
collector:HighStakes.DESCRIPTION: Draw any number of cards. NL if their combined cost exceeds !M! stop drawing, discard any cards drawn and Exhaust this.

collector:Hit.NAME: Hit
collector:Hit.DESCRIPTION: Draw another card NL !M! Energy remains.

collector:Fold.NAME: Fold
collector:Fold.DESCRIPTION: Stop drawing cards. NL !M! is enough

collector:WatchersStaff.NAME: Watchers Staff
collector:WatchersStaff.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Wrath or Calm. NL Gain !M! Energy. NL Exit your Stance Next Turn.
